Incydr Agents run on the endpoints in your environment and monitor for insider risk activity.

These agent APIs replace the deprecated [devices](#tag/Devices) endpoints, enabling support for managing environments
that have undergone the [Incydr Agent Modernization](https://support.code42.com/Incydr/Admin/Planning_and_installing/Getting_started_with_Incydr_agent_modernization)
process.
